translation.en: [man] I remember one of the first times we went surfing.
translation.es: Recuerdo una de las primeras vecesque surfeamos.

translation.en: And Garret, he had a little surfboard and I had a board,
translation.es: Garret tenía una pequeña tabla de surf,y yo tenía una tabla

translation.en: and I... helped him catch a wave, and he really liked it.
translation.es: y lo ayudé a montar una ola,y le encantó.

translation.en: He just caught on right away.
translation.es: Aprendió enseguida.

translation.en: So, I had instilled a love for the ocean for him.
translation.es: Así que le había inculcadoel amor por el océano.

translation.en: We would go fishing and things like that.
translation.es: Íbamos a pescar y esas cosas.

translation.en: Couple years ago, I told him that we bought a lot in Mexico
translation.es: Hace unos años, le dijeque habíamos comprado un terreno en México

translation.en: uh, that is like five minutes away from the water.
translation.es: que estaba a cinco minutos del agua.

translation.en: "Uh, it's a world-class surf spot,
translation.es: Es un lugar de primera para hacer surf.

translation.en: And I want to give it to you." He goes, "What?"
translation.es: "Y quiero dártelo a ti". Dijo: "¿Qué?".

translation.en: You know, and he got all excited,
translation.es: Se emocionó mucho

translation.en: and he was really, really, uh... happy to hear that.
translation.es: y estaba muy feliz por eso.

translation.en: And I says, "Look, but you have to earn enough money
translation.es: Y dije:"Pero debes ganar suficiente dinero

translation.en: to put up a little house on there."
translation.es: para construir una pequeña casa allá".

translation.en: I says, "So, the sooner that you get the money,
translation.es: Le dije: "Cuanto antes juntes el dinero,

translation.en: the sooner you can have it," you know.
translation.es: más pronto podrás tenerla".

translation.en: So he said, "Okay, Dad."
translation.es: Dijo: "Bueno, papá".

translation.en: He got a job on a long-range fishing boat.
translation.es: Consiguió trabajo en un barco pesquero.

translation.en: And then right about a week or so before he was supposed to leave,
translation.es: Y aproximadamente una semanaantes de irse,

translation.en: he calls me, and he says, "Dad, I decided not to go."
translation.es: me llama y me dice: "Papá, decidí no ir".

translation.en: I says, "Why not?"
translation.es: "¿Por qué no?".

translation.en: He says, "Because I know where I can make more money in a lesser amount of time."
translation.es: Dijo: "Porque sé dónde puedo ganarmás dinero en menos tiempo".

translation.en: And I says, "Where?" He says,
translation.es: "¿Dónde?". "En los campos de marihuana medicinaldel norte de California".

translation.en: "Up in the medical marijuana fields up in Northern California."
translation.es: "En los campos de marihuana medicinaldel norte de California".

translation.en: And I said, "No, son.
translation.es: Y le dije: "No, hijo.

translation.en: Don't even get involved with that, please."
translation.es: No te metas en eso, por favor".

translation.en: [man #2] Humboldt, for people that don't know what we are all about, is...
translation.es: Humboldt, para la gente que no nos conoce,siempre fue considerada...

translation.en: always been known as an outlaw community.
translation.es: ...una comunidad clandestina.

translation.en: You say, "Oh, yeah, I'm from Humboldt County,"
translation.es: Dices: "Sí, soy del Condado Humboldt",

translation.en: and people go, "Oh. Okay."
translation.es: y la gente dice: "Ah, bueno".

translation.en: Usually that's a wink-wink, nudge-nudge,
translation.es: CULTIVADOR Generalmente es una situaciónen la que no es necesario decir más,

translation.en: say-no-more situation where, um...
translation.es: Generalmente es una situaciónen la que no es necesario decir más,

translation.en: they're assuming that you're just a pot grower,
translation.es: dan por sentadoque solo cultivas hierba

translation.en: that that's all you're really all about.
translation.es: y que eso es todo lo que haces.

translation.en: What allured me, and I know a lot of people, I think it's the freedom.
translation.es: Lo que me atrajo, y a muchos más también,creo que es la libertad.

translation.en: I think it was the idea of living in the great outdoors, off the grid, being self-sufficient.
translation.es: La idea de vivir en el campo,sin servicios, de ser autosuficiente.

translation.en: That type of thing.
translation.es: Esa clase de cosas.

translation.en: Things that are harmless, really.
translation.es: Cosas inofensivas, realmente.

translation.en: [woman] People come up here from all over.
translation.es: Viene gente de todas partes.

translation.en: Humboldt County is a great destination to find yourself.
translation.es: El Condado Humboldt es un gran destinopara encontrarse a uno mismo.

translation.en: The redwoods, the mountains, the rivers, the ocean.
translation.es: Las secoyas, las montañas,los ríos, el océano.

translation.en: It's the most beautiful place in the world, in my opinion.
translation.es: Para mí, es el lugar más bonito del mundo.

translation.en: But there's a million places to disappear in Humboldt.
translation.es: Pero hay un millón de lugaresdonde desaparecer. INVESTIGADORA PRIVADA

translation.en: -[woman] Can I ask you a question? -[woman] Sure.
translation.es: - ¿Puedo preguntarte algo?- Claro.

translation.en: Are you a local?
translation.es: ¿Vives aquí?

translation.en: No, I'm just here visiting some friends and family.
translation.es: No, vine a visitar a amigos y familia.

translation.en: -Oh, okay. All right, thanks. -Yeah.
translation.es: - Ah, bueno. Bien, gracias.- Sí.

translation.en: Hi, sorry, can I ask you a question? Are you a local?
translation.es: Disculpa, ¿puedo preguntarte algo?¿Vives aquí?

translation.en: -Yeah. -Um...
translation.es: Sí.

translation.en: I'm looking for my daughter.
translation.es: Estoy buscando a mi hija.

translation.en: She's a missing person.
translation.es: Está desaparecida.

translation.en: I actually come from Australia.
translation.es: Soy de Australia.

translation.en: Oh, okay.
translation.es: Ah, bien.

translation.en: And...
-What's her name? -Her name is Asha.
translation.es: - ¿Cómo se llama?- Asha.

translation.en: I can't say I've seen her.
translation.es: No la he visto.

translation.en: -Okay. -Uh-uh.
translation.es: Bueno.

translation.en: -All right. -Yup.
translation.es: - Bien.- Sí.

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.es: Gracias.

translation.en: [woman] There are fliers everywhere.
translation.es: Hay volantes por todas partes.

translation.en: There's old cases that haven't been solved from 30 years ago.
translation.es: Hay casos antiguos, de hace 30 años,que aún no se han resuelto.

translation.en: Then there's cases from a couple years ago that are still unsolved
translation.es: Hay casos no resueltosde hace un par de años... REPORTERA, RADIO KMUD

translation.en: and then there's new cases cropping up.
translation.es: REPORTERA, RADIO KMUD ...y aparecen casos nuevos.

translation.en: You could just tell that there's something going on up here.
translation.es: Se notaba que algo estaba sucediendo aquí.

translation.en: Right? There's always a new missing person on front of the store.
translation.es: Siempre hayuna nueva persona desaparecida. CULTIVADOR

translation.en: There's always these signs.
translation.es: Siempre se ven esos letreros.

translation.en: It's alarming.
translation.es: Es alarmante.

translation.en: [female reporter] The Humboldt County Sheriff's Office
translation.es: SI TIENE INFORMACIÓN, COMUNÍQUESE La policía y la patrullade búsqueda y rescate

translation.en: and search and rescue posse continues the search
translation.es: La policía y la patrullade búsqueda y rescate siguen buscando a una mujer desaparecidaen el área de Petrolia.

translation.en: for a missing woman in the Petrolia area.
translation.es: siguen buscando a una mujer desaparecidaen el área de Petrolia.

translation.en: [man] Do we got folks from search and rescue?
translation.es: ¿Los de búsqueda y rescate?

translation.en: Awesome. Great. Thanks so much for coming.
translation.es: Excelente. Genial.Muchas gracias por venir.

translation.en: And then we got the sheriff as well, so...
translation.es: Y también tenemos al comisario, así que...

translation.en: Yeah. Thanks for being here.
translation.es: Sí. Gracias por venir.

translation.en: So, what I would like to do
translation.es: PLAN DE ACCIÓNOPCIONES

translation.en: is to go from her vehicle and do a ground search
translation.es: Me gustaría empezar en su vehículoy recorrer el terreno

translation.en: to where this river access is at.
translation.es: hasta este acceso al río.

translation.en: Let's investigate that first,
translation.es: Investiguemos eso primero, porquees información desalentadora...

translation.en: because that's daunting information that there's a foul smell
translation.es: Investiguemos eso primero, porquees información desalentadora... SARGENTOCOMISARÍA DEL CONDADO HUMBOLDT ...eso del olor feopuede estar relacionado con algo muerto.

translation.en: uh, that may be related with something deceased.
translation.es: ...eso del olor feopuede estar relacionado con algo muerto.

translation.en: [man] It's called the Humboldt County Sheriff's Posse, is what we are.
translation.es: Se llama la Patrulla del Comisariodel Condado Humboldt.

translation.en: We're volunteers. We're there just to help.
translation.es: Somos voluntarios.Estamos aquí para ayudar.

translation.en: Not only do we do search and rescue, we do evidence searches.
translation.es: No solo hacemos búsqueda y rescate,buscamos pruebas.

translation.en: We'll help them out if somebody tosses a gun into a field.
translation.es: Los ayudamos,si alguien tira un arma en un campo... PATRULLA DEL COMISARIO

translation.en: We'll go and help them search for that gun if they can't find it.
translation.es: ...y no pueden encontrarla,ayudamos a buscarla.

translation.en: Law enforcement in Humboldt is definitely spread thin.
translation.es: La policía de Humboldttiene demasiado trabajo.

translation.en: Definitely.
translation.es: Definitivamente.

translation.en: They deal with a lot of things that other counties don't have to deal with.
translation.es: Deben lidiar con muchas cosasque no suceden en otros condados.

translation.en: I've found a few bodies, yup.
translation.es: He encontrado cuerpos, sí.

translation.en: I've definitely found a few bodies.
translation.es: He encontrado cuerpos.

translation.en: But I think being able to, you know,
translation.es: Pero creo que poder

translation.en: at least return that child to his parents.
translation.es: al menos devolverle un hijoa sus padres...

translation.en: I think as a parent, not knowing, you know, where your child is...
translation.es: Creo que, como padre,no saber dónde está tu hijo...

translation.en: you know, I'd much rather know.
translation.es: Preferiría saber.

translation.en: [Sgt. Kerry] It's a really difficult area.
translation.es: Es una zona muy difícil.

translation.en: You can bring out 100 personnel and air assets.
translation.es: Puedes traer a 100 personas y apoyo aéreo.

translation.en: However, your search area becomes infinite
translation.es: Sin embargo, el área de búsquedase vuelve infinita

translation.en: once you rule out the high-probability areas.
translation.es: una vez que descartaslas zonas más probables.

translation.en: After that, then it's just a matter of getting the word out to the community
translation.es: Después de eso,hay que avisarle a la comunidad

translation.en: to be on the lookout for our missing person
translation.es: para que estén atentos por si vena nuestra persona perdida

translation.en: and to contact the sheriff's office.
translation.es: y contacten a la comisaría.

translation.en: The Humboldt County Sheriff's Office is asking for the public
translation.es: La Comisaría de Humboldt pide

translation.en: -to keep an eye out for a missing man. -For a missing woman.
translation.es: - que busquen a un hombre...- ...mujer.

translation.en: -Another man is missing. -Mysteriously disappeared.
translation.es: - Un hombre...- Desapareció misteriosamente.

translation.en: Last seen on Highway 36.
translation.es: Se lo vio en la autopista 36.

translation.en: [man] More missing people than any other county in California.
translation.es: Más desaparecidosque en el resto de California.

translation.en: Why is that?
translation.es: ¿Por qué ocurre eso?

translation.en: [Eileen] There are a lot of missing people here.
translation.es: Hay muchos desaparecidos en Humboldt.

translation.en: I think a lot of people come up to Humboldt County
translation.es: Creo que muchos vienen a Humboldt

translation.en: to get away from life somewhere else.
translation.es: para escapar de su vida en otro lugar.

translation.en: So you already have a culture of people who kind of want to disappear.
translation.es: Así que ya existe una culturade gente que quiere desaparecer.

translation.en: A lot of the public opinion out there believe that there is possibly a serial killer.
translation.es: Según la opinión pública,es posible que haya un asesino serial.

translation.en: [man] It's crossed my mind.
translation.es: Se me ha pasado por la mente.

translation.en: You know, like, I couldn't-- That's one of the things that came across my mind.
translation.es: Es una de las cosasque se me cruzaron por la mente,

translation.en: "Maybe there's a serial killer that's killing all these people or something.
translation.es: quizá hay un asesino serialque está matando a toda esa gente,

translation.en: All these missing people."
translation.es: a los desaparecidos.

translation.en: It's a really remote place.
translation.es: Es un lugar muy remoto.

translation.en: This is why people came here in the first place, it's the remoteness.
translation.es: Por eso la gente viene aquíen primer lugar, por lo remoto.

translation.en: It makes you kind of think, what if this guy came up here because he could get away with this?
translation.es: Te hace pensar, ¿y si este tipo vino aquíporque podría salirse con la suya?

translation.en: You know?
translation.es: ¿Entiendes?

translation.en: That narrative is flashy and attractive and misleading.
translation.es: Ese discurso es llamativo,atractivo y engañoso. PERIODISTA

translation.en: [interviewer] If it's not a serial killer, then what is it?
translation.es: Si no es un asesino, ¿qué es?

translation.en: I-I do not-- If I knew, then I guess these wouldn't be unsolved cases.
translation.es: No sé... Si lo supiera,no serían casos no resueltos.

translation.en: [Eileen] What brings you to Northern California?
translation.es: ¿Qué te trae al norte de California?

translation.en: [woman] I have come to Northern California
translation.es: Vine al norte de Californiaa buscar a mi hija...

translation.en: looking for my daughter,
translation.es: RADIO COMUNITARIA DE REDWOOD

translation.en: who became a missing person
translation.es: ...que está desaparecidadesde el 21 de septiembre...

translation.en: on September 21st, 2015.
translation.es: ...que está desaparecidadesde el 21 de septiembre... MADRE DE MUJER DESAPARECIDA ...de 2015.

translation.en: So you have had some reports and you followed up.
translation.es: Así que hubo algunas pistasy las seguiste.

translation.en: I get vague reports, yes.
translation.es: Sí, pistas vagas, sí.

translation.en: But you would say nothing that you really felt like...
translation.es: Pero no fue nadaque realmente sintieras...

translation.en: No. I did have a girl, the other day,
translation.es: No. Hubo una chica, el otro día,

translation.en: say that she spoke to someone with a tattoo like Asha's,
translation.es: que dijo que habló con alguienque tenía un tatuaje como el de Asha,

translation.en: and that made me feel really good.
translation.es: y eso me hizo sentir bien.

translation.en: I can imagine.
translation.es: Me imagino.

translation.en: [Eileen] And how has local law enforcement responded?
translation.es: ¿LA VISTE? ¿Y cómo respondió la policía local?

translation.en: [Jeannie] The local law enforcement, um...
translation.es: La policía local...

translation.en: yeah, it's a tricky...
translation.es: Sí, es algo complicado...

translation.en: it's a tricky thing in that they have been,
translation.es: Es complicado, porque han sido

translation.en: I would say, overly kind to me,
translation.es: demasiado amables conmigo,

translation.en: and they would lend me an ear at any time of the day or night.
translation.es: y me escuchaban a toda hora.

translation.en: However, their MO is different than what we may think it should be.
translation.es: Sin embargo, no estamos de acuerdocon su modus operandi.

translation.en: And you realize that it's really up to you,
translation.es: Y te das cuenta de que,en realidad, depende de ti,

translation.en: the individual family member... She looks familiar, for some reason. ...to lead the charge.
translation.es: el familiar debe liderar la búsqueda.

translation.en: I believe that's because they have so many reports of missing people.
translation.es: Creo que es porque tienen tantos casosde personas desaparecidas.

translation.en: [Eileen] To leave an anonymous message, you can call 213-986-7671
translation.es: Para dejar un mensaje anónimo,pueden llamar al 213-986-7671

translation.en: or Facebook, "Help Find Asha Kreimer."
translation.es: o por Facebook en:"Ayuden a encontrar a Asha Kreimer".

translation.en: Reporting for KMUD News, this is Eileen Russell.
translation.es: Para KMUD Noticias, soy Eileen Russell.

translation.en: There are so many missing persons in Humboldt County that law enforcement
translation.es: Hay tantas personas desaparecidasen el Condado Humboldt que la policía

translation.en: cannot possibly keep up with it.
translation.es: no da abasto.

translation.en: Within the sheriff's department,
translation.es: COMISARÍA En la comisaría,el detective de personas desaparecidas

translation.en: a lot of times the missing persons detective
translation.es: En la comisaría,el detective de personas desaparecidas

translation.en: is also a homicide detective.
translation.es: suele ser también detective de homicidios.

translation.en: This is where our records bureau, where we process,
translation.es: Este es el archivo, donde procesamos

translation.en: you know, 12,000 police reports every year.
translation.es: 12 000 informes policiales por año.

translation.en: And missing persons cases, crime reports, those kind of things.
translation.es: Y los casos de personas desaparecidas,denuncias de delitos, esas cosas.

translation.en: [man] I did have a question,
translation.es: Una pregunta, como alguien interesado

translation.en: as somebody who looks at a lot of crime and missing person cases.
translation.es: Una pregunta, como alguien interesado - en las desapariciones.- Sí.

translation.en: Wouldn't it be easier to have one dude who looks at all these missing people
translation.es: ¿No sería más fácil que una personainvestigara las desapariciones,

translation.en: rather than just spending it out, and...
translation.es: en lugar de dividirlo, y...

translation.en: You know, it all depends, because a voluntary missing person...
translation.es: COMISARIOCONDADO HUMBOLDT Depende, porque si alguiendesapareció voluntariamente...

translation.en: You know, we have our detective bureau
translation.es: Depende, porque si alguiendesapareció voluntariamente... ...hay una oficinaque investiga esos casos,

translation.en: that looks at these cases, and we have a caseload.
translation.es: ...hay una oficinaque investiga esos casos, y tenemos montones.

translation.en: The problem is, when you have, you know, 20 homicides in a year,
translation.es: El problema es que,cuando tienes 20 homicidios al año,

translation.en: some of those things get pushed to the side. And it's an important thing for us to do, absolutely,
translation.es: algunas de esas cosas se dejan de lado.Y son importantes, absolutamente,

translation.en: but we also, with the limited resources we have, we have to prioritize, you know.
translation.es: pero como tenemos recursos limitados,tenemos que establecer prioridades.

translation.en: And also, people have to work with us.
translation.es: Y la gente debe ayudarnos.

translation.en: [Ryan] Especially in southern Humboldt, if there's a problem,
translation.es: Especialmente en el sur de Humboldt,si hay un problema,

translation.en: they can't go to law enforcement, because their lifestyle
translation.es: no pueden ir a la policíapor su estilo de vida,

translation.en: and the way they've been making money has been illegal, and still is illegal,
translation.es: y porque su fuente de dinero era ilegaly sigue siendo ilegal,

translation.en: unless you have a permit, which those are few and far between even now.
translation.es: a menos que tengas un permiso,algo que aún no es muy frecuente.

translation.en: What we are finding is that missing persons
translation.es: Podemos notar que es muy difícil... PERIODISTA

translation.en: are very difficult to find in Humboldt County.
translation.es: ...encontrar gente perdidaen el Condado Humboldt.

translation.en: And a lot of that is tied back into the cannabis industry.
translation.es: Y está relacionadocon la industria del cannabis.

translation.en: [woman] A harvest is a really big deal, because you're thinking,
translation.es: La cosecha es importante, porque piensas:

translation.en: "We made it this far.
translation.es: "Llegamos hasta aquí.

translation.en: There's one last chance that we're going to get busted."
translation.es: Hay una última chancede que nos arresten".

translation.en: A trimmer, or trimmigrant, would be anybody who comes to Humboldt
translation.es: Un trimmer o trimmigrant es... CULTIVADORA

translation.en: specifically to make money during harvest trimming.
translation.es: ...alguien que vienea trabajar cortando cogollos.

translation.en: When I first started trimming, it was just hippie girls, mostly.
translation.es: Cuando empecé a cortar,la mayoría eran chicas hippies.

translation.en: All the trimmers were women.
translation.es: Todas eran mujeres.

translation.en: Mostly because Greg used to say, and I agree,
translation.es: Principalmente porque Greg decía,y coincido,

translation.en: that guys eat more, they drink more, and they sleep more.
translation.es: que los hombres comen más,beben más, y duermen más.

translation.en: Also, usually a hippie girl wouldn't come back and rob you.
translation.es: Normalmente, una chica hippieno volvería a robarte.

translation.en: But her boyfriend would.
translation.es: Pero su novio sí.

translation.en: I was just gonna stay for a year or two, and I couldn't ever leave.
translation.es: Iba a quedarme un año o dos,y nunca pude irme.

translation.en: I really fell in love with the lifestyle.
translation.es: Me enamoré del estilo de vida.

translation.en: It just seemed like a different world that I couldn't believe it existed.
translation.es: Parecía un mundo diferenteque no podía creer que existiera.

translation.en: It's not easy, but it is a much more satisfying life than
translation.es: No es fácil, pero es una vida mucho más gratificanteque la que habría tenido con mi título.

translation.en: what I had my graduate degree in.
translation.es: pero es una vida mucho más gratificanteque la que habría tenido con mi título.

translation.en: And it wasn't just the money, it was the community.
translation.es: Y no era solo el dinero, era la comunidad.

translation.en: It was our cabin, it was our land, specifically.
translation.es: Era nuestra cabaña,nuestra tierra, específicamente.

translation.en: That's our family business.
translation.es: Es el negocio familiar.

translation.en: Kids come up here sometimes thinking this is one big reggae festival.
translation.es: Los chicos vienen pensandoque es un gran festival de reggae.

translation.en: They feel like they're gonna come to paradise,
translation.es: Sienten que vendrán al paraíso,

translation.en: that they're gonna make a ton of money, they're gonna be smoking weed,
translation.es: que ganarán un montón de dinero,que fumarán hierba,

translation.en: living the good life up in the forest, up in the mountains.
translation.es: que se darán la gran vidaen el bosque, en las montañas.

translation.en: And when they get there, a lot of times they end up in dangerous situations.
translation.es: Y cuando llegan, muchas vecesterminan en situaciones peligrosas.

translation.en: And a lot of times, bad things happen, and a lot of times,
translation.es: Y muchas veces pasan cosas malas, y

translation.en: it's not even close to what they think this Shangri-La trip of theirs
translation.es: la experiencia ni se acercaa ese viaje paradisíaco... TENIENTECOMISARÍA DEL CONDADO HUMBOLDT

translation.en: is what they thought it was gonna be.
translation.es: TENIENTECOMISARÍA DEL CONDADO HUMBOLDT ...que imaginaban.

translation.en: I found these four trimmers on the side of the road.
translation.es: Encontré a 4 trimmersal costado de la ruta.

translation.en: Just picked them up.
translation.es: Los llevé en mi auto.

translation.en: I liked them, they were cool, they were nice.
translation.es: Me caían bien.Eran geniales, eran amables.

translation.en: So that's why I brought them here, to work for me.
translation.es: Los traje para que trabajen para mí.

translation.en: Trim the product from fresh cannabis into a marketable product to sell.
translation.es: CULTIVADOR Para cortar el producto,el cannabis fresco y que se pueda vender.

translation.en: [man] How long you been here? One month now.
translation.es: - ¿Cuánto hace que estás aquí?- Un mes.

translation.en: -One month? -Yeah.
translation.es: - ¿Un mes?- Sí.

translation.en: We can say that we were lucky because we found Carlos,
translation.es: La verdad es que tuvimos suerte,porque encontramos a Carlos,

translation.en: and he's a really good guy and he care about us.
translation.es: y es un tipo muy bueno y le importamos.

translation.en: And the farm is really nice.
translation.es: Y la familia es muy amable.

translation.en: [girl #2] I'm from France. We're from Brittany, north of France.
translation.es: Soy de Francia. Somos de Bretaña.Está al norte de Francia.

translation.en: And we took the bus... San Francisco, to here, Garberville.
translation.es: Y tomamos un autobúsde San Francisco a Garberville.

translation.en: Joanna and me were so scared, because we are only two girls
translation.es: Joanna y yo teníamos mucho miedo,porque solo somos dos chicas

translation.en: who didn't know nobody here, you know, nothing here.
translation.es: que no conocían a nadie aquí, ni nada.

translation.en: [man] You're stuck up here?
translation.es: ¿Están atrapadas?

translation.en: -Yes. -You can't go?
translation.es: - Sí.- ¿No pueden irse?

translation.en: -No. -No, because you don't have the car.
translation.es: - No.- No, porque no tienes el auto.

translation.en: They sleep in the trailer, or in this room,
translation.es: Duermen en el remolqueo en esta habitación,

translation.en: wherever they're comfortable.
translation.es: donde estén más cómodos.

translation.en: Then they come here and work 12 hours a day.
translation.es: Luego vienen aquíy trabajan 12 horas al día.

translation.en: [man] I pay $150 per pound, and the fast ones do two pounds a day;
translation.es: Pago 150 dólares por medio kilo,y los más rápidos hacen un kilo por día,

translation.en: the slow ones get a pound a day.
translation.es: los lentos, medio por día.

translation.en: [girl] There's grandmothers that live here and do this work that have,
translation.es: Hay abuelas que viven aquíy hacen este trabajo,

translation.en: you know, this has been their life.
translation.es: esta ha sido su vida.

translation.en: [man] Beautiful.
translation.es: Hermoso.

translation.en: Boy, it looks so good.
translation.es: Se ven tan bien.

translation.en: I've never hired trimmigrants, personally. I usually like to hire a local.
translation.es: Nunca contraté inmigrantes.Normalmente contrato gente local.

translation.en: These are amazing. They have no spurs. They have no crow's feet.
translation.es: Estos son increíbles. No tienen brotes.No tienen patas de gallo.

translation.en: It actually gives the essence and the beauty of the whole bud.
translation.es: Tiene la esencia y la bellezade todo el capullo.

translation.en: What I like to term sexiness.
translation.es: Lo que me gusta llamar sensualidad.

translation.en: You got to be cautious as well,
translation.es: Debes tener cuidado también,

translation.en: because you're working with people that are either
translation.es: porque o trabajarás para personas que

translation.en: like myself that are open and cool
translation.es: como yo, son abiertas y tranquilas,

translation.en: and willing to more or less be your friend
translation.es: y están dispuestas a ser como tu amigo

translation.en: and not want anything from you,
translation.es: y no quieren nada  de ti,

translation.en: other than just your service to clean my weed.
translation.es: excepto tu serviciopara que limpies la hierba.

translation.en: Or you're gonna step into an environment with somebody--
translation.es: O te meterás en un ambiente con alguien...

translation.en: they don't really care about your feelings at all.
translation.es: ...a quien no le importantus sentimientos.

translation.en: They just want the work done and maybe a little something extra from you.
translation.es: Solo quieren que hagas el trabajoy tal vez algo más.

translation.en: I heard weird stories.
translation.es: Escuché historias extrañas.Una chica pedía trabajo

translation.en: One girl, you know, asking for a job, and he wanted her...
translation.es: Escuché historias extrañas.Una chica pedía trabajo y él quería que trabajarapara él sin camiseta.

translation.en: to work for him-- He wanted her to work topless.
translation.es: y él quería que trabajarapara él sin camiseta.

translation.en: And she refused.
translation.es: Y ella se negó.

translation.en: But then I was coming up this other girl from the edge of the supermarket,
translation.es: Pero apareció otra chicaal costado del supermercado

translation.en: and she, "Yeah, okay, I'll do it." Just jumped in, and they went off.
translation.es: y dijo: "Sí, lo haré".Y se metió y se fueron.

translation.en: And I'm like, "What the fuck?"
translation.es: ¿Qué carajo?

translation.en: A lot of the trimmigrants is very trusting,
translation.es: Muchos inmigrantes son confiados,

translation.en: jump in a car with anybody, go out, you know, 20 miles into who knows where.
translation.es: se meten en un auto con cualquiera,van 30 kilómetros quién sabe adónde.

translation.en: Ten miles on a one-lane dirt road.
translation.es: Hacen 15 kilómetrospor un camino de tierra.

translation.en: Poor cell phone reception here. People don't realize that.
translation.es: La señal es mala aquí. No lo notan.

translation.en: They come here, don't realize that cell phones don't work in 90% of the places.
translation.es: Vienen y no saben que los celularesno funcionan en el 90% de los lugares.

translation.en: It can be a very dangerous...
translation.es: Puede ser una decisión...

translation.en: choice to go out in the hills and try to make the big money here.
translation.es: ...muy peligrosa, ir a las colinasy tratar de ganar dinero.

translation.en: A common thing to do in the beat one, which is the downtown, is to watch these bus stops.
translation.es: Algo que se hace normalmente en el centroes observar las paradas de autobuses.

translation.en: You can kinda tell.
translation.es: Puedes darte cuenta.

translation.en: There's younger folks that think they're coming off here for the green gold.
translation.es: Hay chicos jóvenes que creenque vienen por el oro verde.

translation.en: And, uh...
translation.es: DETECTIVEPOLICÍA DE EUREKA Y se bajan del autobús.

translation.en: step off the bus.
translation.es: Y se bajan del autobús.

translation.en: They think they're gonna step right into meeting somebody and getting a job
translation.es: Creen que enseguida conocerán a alguieny conseguirán trabajo

translation.en: trimming some weed, and making their millions,
translation.es: cortando hierba y ganarán millones,

translation.en: and coming back to home where they came from with loads of cash.
translation.es: y volverán a casa con mucho dinero.

translation.en: But chances are, when they step off the bus, especially here, um, there's...
translation.es: Pero lo más probable es que,cuando lleguen, especialmente aquí...

translation.en: a population of people that are waiting to take advantage of them.
translation.es: ...haya mucha gente esperandopara aprovecharse de ellos.

translation.en: Either rob them of whatever they've got,
translation.es: Para robarles sus pertenencias

translation.en: or take them into labor trafficking situations,
translation.es: o ponerlos en situacionesde trabajo esclavo,

translation.en: even sex trafficking situations.
translation.es: incluso tráfico sexual.

translation.en: And that's not just the girls. The guys, too, are trafficked.
translation.es: Y no solo las chicas.Los chicos también se trafican.

translation.en: [man] Garret told me, "Dad, you know, I've never worked so hard in all my life.
translation.es: Garret me dijo: "Papá,nunca trabajé tanto en mi vida.

translation.en: I start early in the morning and I come in late at night.
translation.es: Empiezo tempranoy termino a la noche, tarde.

translation.en: And I'm just so tired."
translation.es: Y estoy tan cansado".

translation.en: They really used him up there to do a lot.
translation.es: Realmente lo usaron para hacer mucho. PADRE DE GARRET

translation.en: Basically, he was in charge of their whole crop.
translation.es: Básicamente estaba a cargode todo el cultivo.

translation.en: A lot of people from San Diego, hippie types that would go up there
translation.es: Mucha gente de San Diego,los hippies, iban allí

translation.en: because they like to smoke weed, and want to be around weed.
translation.es: para fumar hierba,y estar en ese ambiente.

translation.en: So if you work for a month straight trimming bud, you got a good amount of money, you know?
translation.es: Y si trabajas un mes cortando,ganas una buena cantidad de dinero.

translation.en: Um, but yeah, more seasonal.
translation.es: Pero es estacional.

translation.en: What Garret was doing was, he was trying to go big time.
translation.es: AMIGO DE OCEAN BEACH Garret estaba intentando triunfar,

translation.en: You know, like run a farm.
translation.es: administrar una granja.

translation.en: His intention was to stack up a couple hundred grand
translation.es: Su intención era juntaralgunos cientos de miles

translation.en: or something and retire in Mexico and fish.
translation.es: para retirarse en México y pescar.

translation.en: And, you know...
translation.es: Y, ya sabes...

translation.en: Humboldt County... any place, really, where there's a drug trade...
translation.es: El Condado Humboldt... Cualquier lugaren el que haya comercio de drogas...

translation.en: it's not that easy. You got to be willing to do the dirt,
translation.es: No es fácil. Debes hacer el trabajo sucio

translation.en: or shut the fuck up and get the fuck out as soon as humanly possible.
translation.es: o callarte e intentar salir de ahílo más rápido posible.

translation.en: I would at least get a call from him maybe once every two weeks,
translation.es: Me llamaba por lo menosuna vez cada dos semanas

translation.en: and we would talk for a long time.
translation.es: y hablábamos mucho.

translation.en: Over the months, I think it was maybe about a year or so he had been up there, and then...
translation.es: Pasaron los meses, creo que estuvo allíun año más o menos, y entonces...

translation.en: all of a sudden, the calls stopped.
translation.es: ...de repente, no hubo más llamadas.

translation.en: And then right away, I started thinking to myself,
translation.es: Y enseguida empecé a pensar:

translation.en: "Something happened."
translation.es: "Pasó algo".

translation.en: One of the driving motivations of coming here was to seek self-sufficiency.
translation.es: Uno de los factores motivantes para venirera buscar la autosuficiencia.

translation.en: We were gonna grow our own food; we were gonna grow our own staples.
translation.es: Íbamos a cultivar nuestra comida,íbamos a cultivar lo esencial.

translation.en: One of the staples of a hippie lifestyle
translation.es: Algo esencial para la vida hippiees la marihuana.

translation.en: is marijuana.
translation.es: CULTIVADOR ORIGINAL

translation.en: So you grow lettuce, you plant a seed of lettuce, you plant a seed of pot.
translation.es: Así que plantas una semilla de lechugay una de hierba.

translation.en: We didn't come here to grow weed.
translation.es: No vinimos a cultivar hierba.

translation.en: We came here because in our various ways, we were escaping something.
translation.es: Vinimos porque, en cierta forma,estábamos escapando de algo.

translation.en: Some people were escaping a war that had gone on for years.
translation.es: Algunos escapabande una guerra que llevaba años.

translation.en: Some people were returning from that war as veterans who had seen...
translation.es: Algunos regresaban de esa guerracomo veteranos que habían visto...

translation.en: whatever ugliness they saw and wanted to escape that.
translation.es: ...lo que sea que hayan visto,querían escapar de eso.

translation.en: Some people were running to something.
translation.es: Otros perseguían algo.

translation.en: Some people were running to a lifestyle which was more attractive
translation.es: Otros perseguíanun estilo de vida más atractivo

translation.en: than that which was offered by the mainstream society.
translation.es: que el que les ofrecíala cultura dominante.

translation.en: [man] The old-timers came here to hide, basically.
translation.es: Los pioneros vinierona esconderse, básicamente.

translation.en: This was a place where you could do it.
translation.es: Aquí podías hacerlo.

translation.en: And the growing was a way to survive.
translation.es: CULTIVADOR Y el cultivo era una forma de sobrevivir.

translation.en: They didn't come here to plant fields of cannabis.
translation.es: No vinieron a plantar campos de cannabis.

translation.en: But it soon turned into that.
translation.es: Pero se transformó en eso.

translation.en: I think the reason why Humboldt County became Humboldt County
translation.es: Creo que el Condado Humboldt es lo que es

translation.en: is because it has these woods and it has these hills.
translation.es: porque tiene estos bosquesy estos cerros.

translation.en: The advantage that we had over other places in California,
translation.es: La ventaja que tenemossobre el resto de California

translation.en: in terms of growing marijuana, is our geographic isolation
translation.es: para cultivar marihuanaes el aislamiento geográfico

translation.en: and how easy it is to hide your crop from law enforcement.
translation.es: y lo fácil que esesconder tu cultivo de la policía.

translation.en: There's nothing special about the soil in Humboldt County,
translation.es: No hay nada en la tierradel Condado Humboldt,

translation.en: the climate here in Humboldt County, you know,
translation.es: ni en el clima del Condado Humboldt

translation.en: that makes it overall the best place to grow marijuana in the world.
translation.es: que lo haga el mejor lugar del mundopara cultivar marihuana.

translation.en: It's just our geography.
translation.es: Solo nuestra geografía.

translation.en: That's really what it comes down to, is you can hide.
translation.es: A eso se debe, puedes esconderte.

translation.en: You can hide in the hills, you can hide behind several locked gates
translation.es: Puedes esconderte en los cerros,detrás de verjas

translation.en: and private roads under the canopy of the redwood forest, your marijuana.
translation.es: y calles privadas, bajo las copasde los árboles del bosque de secoyas.

translation.en: You get to Humboldt, there's a redwood curtain there at the county line.
translation.es: Llegas a Humboldty hay una cortina de secoyas.

translation.en: The redwood curtain says that you're here, you've arrived.
translation.es: La cortina te diceque estás aquí, que llegaste.

translation.en: In the old days, people would come up here and they would...
translation.es: Antes, las personas venían... EXCULTIVADOR CLANDESTINO

translation.en: load up here right here, and they would put a lookout down there,
translation.es: ...y cargaban aquí, justo aquí,y ponían un vigilante ahí

translation.en: and one down here.
translation.es: y otro allí.

translation.en: They would go up this hill on the ranch,
translation.es: Subían esta colina en el rancho,

translation.en: and they would have a better position so they could see everything.
translation.es: y tenían una mejor posición para ver todo.

translation.en: They would be up there with walkie-talkies and the whole thing.
translation.es: Estaban allá arriba con radiotransmisores.

translation.en: People were so paranoid back then. Oh, God.
translation.es: La gente estaba tan paranoicaen esa época. Dios.

translation.en: You could get ten years or more
translation.es: Te podían dar diez años o más

translation.en: just for conspiracy to distribute marijuana.
translation.es: solo por conspirarpara distribuir marihuana.

translation.en: I don't know if you've ever had one gun pointed at you before.
translation.es: No sé si alguna vezte apuntaron con un arma.

translation.en: When you have 20, it's a little unsettling.
translation.es: Cuando tienes 20, es un poco perturbador.

translation.en: I've been under the blades running a lot,
translation.es: Muchas veces tuve que escaparmeescondiéndome bajo los árboles,

translation.en: but they could never catch me.
translation.es: pero nunca pudieron atraparme.

translation.en: These were people that had lived their whole lives on the outlaw side of the coin
translation.es: Esta era gente que había vividotoda su vida fuera de la ley

translation.en: that all of a sudden have been welcomed back into high society, civilization.
translation.es: y que de repente pasó a ser partede la alta sociedad, de la civilización.

translation.en: They were criminals, straight up.
translation.es: Eran delincuentes, francamente.

translation.en: Now, they want to be law-abiding citizens,
translation.es: Ahora quieren respetar las leyes

translation.en: and the state has given them a pathway to do that.
translation.es: y el estado les dio un caminopara hacerlo.

translation.en: [male reporter] The approval of Prop 64 launches the state
translation.es: La aprobación de la proposición 64establece un sistema

translation.en: on establishing a system for moving marijuana
translation.es: La aprobación de la proposición 64establece un sistema para que la marihuana pasedel mercado negro al mercado legal.

translation.en: from the black market to the retail market.
translation.es: para que la marihuana pasedel mercado negro al mercado legal.

translation.en: [man] It's Humboldt; it's the Emerald Triangle.
translation.es: Es Humboldt, Triángulo Esmeralda.

translation.en: This is gonna be the new Sonoma County of the pot industry.
translation.es: Será la Sonomade la industria de la hierba. CULTIVADOR

translation.en: [Cyrus] You take, like, Napa for instance, and their operation is their region,
translation.es: Piensa en Napa, por ejemplo,y su operación en su región,

translation.en: and the soil, and the water,
translation.es: y la tierra y el agua,

translation.en: and everything that creates these wonderful grapes.
translation.es: y todo lo que crea esas maravillosas uvas.

translation.en: The marijuana world hasn't really had the opportunity to prove that yet,
translation.es: El mundo de la marihuana aún no tuvola oportunidad de probar eso

translation.en: just because of being illegal.
translation.es: porque era ilegal.

translation.en: [girl] This marketing guy told us that the name Humboldt has as much equity
translation.es: Un chico de marketing nos dijoque el nombre Humboldt tiene tanto valor

translation.en: as Coca-Cola or something.
translation.es: como Coca-Cola o algo así.

translation.en: So that made me hopeful.
translation.es: Eso me dio esperanzas.

translation.en: I thought, well, you know, it certainly means that to me,
translation.es: Pensé, bueno... Significa eso para mí,

translation.en: so maybe that'll be able to be our ace in the hole.
translation.es: así que tal vez ese podrá sernuestro as en la manga.

translation.en: Just the Humboldt legacy.
translation.es: Simplemente el legado de Humboldt.

translation.en: [Sheriff] We're giving amnesty for people while they come in the permit process.
translation.es: Les brindamos amnistíamientras consiguen el permiso.

translation.en: The state has allowed them to continue to grow, to go through the permit process,
translation.es: El estado les permitió seguir cultivando,conseguir el permiso,

translation.en: and start paying their taxes and doing things right.
translation.es: y empezar a pagar impuestosy a hacer las cosas bien.

translation.en: [man] Spicy.
translation.es: Picante.

translation.en: [girl] Going legal, there's a lot we're gaining, there's a lot that we're losing.
translation.es: Con la legalidad, ganamos muchoy perdemos mucho.

translation.en: -Look. -That's awesome!
translation.es: - Mira.- ¡Es increíble!

translation.en: We're gaining freedom from fear...
translation.es: Ganamos una vida sin miedo,

translation.en: dignity.
translation.es: dignidad.

translation.en: Thanks.
translation.es: Gracias.

translation.en: I know.
translation.es: Lo sé.

translation.en: I have hid in the woods with my children when I was pregnant
translation.es: Me he escondido en el bosqueembarazada y con mis hijos

translation.en: while the helicopters totally circled.
translation.es: Me he escondido en el bosqueembarazada y con mis hijos mientras los helicópteros circulaban.

translation.en: Daddy can't-- Daddy said they're probably broken.
translation.es: Papá dice que probablemente están rotos.

translation.en: What are you losing?
translation.es: ¿Qué pierden?

translation.en: I feel we're gonna lose a little bit of our community,
translation.es: Siento que perderemos la comunidad,

translation.en: our sense of what makes Humboldt Humboldt.
translation.es: lo que hace que Humboldt sea Humboldt.

translation.en: This is the last outlaw harvest, yeah.
translation.es: Esta es la última cosecha ilegal, sí.

translation.en: [man] When it comes down to making a decision whether...
translation.es: Cuando tienes que decidir si...

translation.en: you're going to stop when the lights are flashing behind you,
translation.es: ...te detendrás al ver las lucescentelleando detrás de ti,

translation.en: or if that means go.
translation.es: o si acelerarás.

translation.en: An outlaw always chooses go.
translation.es: Si vives fuera de la ley, aceleras.

translation.en: People think that a change in the dynamic of the marketplace
translation.es: Si la gente cree que el cambioen la dinámica del mercado

translation.en: that Prop 64 is gonna bring is gonna be able to...
translation.es: que traerá la proposición 64... CULTIVADOR DEL MERCADO NEGRO

translation.en: stop the people with that kind of tenacity...
translation.es: ...detendrá a la gentecon esa clase de tenacidad...

translation.en: then I don't think they have the slightest clue on what goes on in this county.
translation.es: ...no tienen ni idea de lo que sucedeen este condado.

translation.en: Well, since arriving here, I've been shot at,
translation.es: Desde que llegué aquí, me han disparado,

translation.en: I've been beaten, I've been kidnapped three times.
translation.es: me han golpeado,me secuestraron tres veces.

translation.en: Had a gun shoved in my mouth, tied to a chair. Kicked down a flight of stairs.
translation.es: Me pusieron un arma en la boca, me ataron.Me tiraron por escaleras.

translation.en: Hunted ruthlessly through town.
translation.es: Me buscaron implacablemente por la ciudad.

translation.en: And... I don't think I'll ever leave. I love it here.
translation.es: Y... creo que nunca me iré.Me encanta este lugar.

translation.en: Before I moved out here, I worked in politics in Utah as a campaign manager and as a lobbyist.
translation.es: Antes de venir, era director de campañay miembro de un grupo de presión.

translation.en: I got burned out on it pretty quick.
translation.es: Me agotó bastante rápido.

translation.en: I actually came here by accident.
translation.es: Llegué por accidente.

translation.en: Our car ended up breaking down in Garberville.
translation.es: Se nos rompió el auto en Garberville.

translation.en: And we needed to replace the starter in the Buick.
translation.es: Y necesitábamos cambiarel motor de arranque del Buick.

translation.en: Got a job at the local Chinese place for...
translation.es: Conseguí un trabajoen el restaurante chino local...

translation.en: well, pretty much the first day I was here.
translation.es: ...prácticamente el día que llegué.

translation.en: And, uh... trimming job a couple weeks later.
translation.es: Y... trabajo cortando marihuanaunas semanas después.

translation.en: And the next thing you knew, I was up on the hill.
translation.es: Y de repente, estaba en el cerro.

translation.en: [Det. John] Up until the '90s, we had your basic hippie growers in the hills.
translation.es: Hasta los 90, estaban los típicoscultivadores hippies en los cerros.

translation.en: We had a lot of ranchers.
translation.es: Había ganaderos.

translation.en: We still have the timber industry, the fishing industry.
translation.es: Aún tenemos la industria maderera,la pesquera.

translation.en: This was a nice, artsy, quaint but industrial town.
translation.es: Era una linda ciudad, artísticay pintoresca, pero industrial.

translation.en: But in the '90s, the population of these small communities in the hills went from,
translation.es: Pero en los 90, la población de estaspequeñas comunidades en los cerros

translation.en: you know, 50, 60 people up to a couple thousand.
translation.es: fue de 50, 60 personas a un par de miles.

translation.en: [Sheriff] We have 4,000 square miles of jurisdiction.
translation.es: Tenemos 6500 kilómetros cuadradosde jurisdicción.

translation.en: And we have 15,000 illegal grows up here.
translation.es: Y tenemos 15 000 cultivos ilegales aquí.

translation.en: It is unbelievable.
translation.es: MARIHUANA MEDICINAL Es increíble.

translation.en: Greed has fueled this industry,
translation.es: La avaricia impulsó esta industria,

translation.en: and that greed will continue to push people into violence
translation.es: y esa avaricia continuará llevandoa la gente a la violencia

translation.en: and to cutting their bottom line wherever they can.
translation.es: y a sacar ventaja cuando puedan.

translation.en: This is not the hippie marijuana industry anymore.
translation.es: Ya no es la industria hippiede la marihuana.

translation.en: You are taking your life in your own hands if you go up in these areas and you work for one of these unpermitted growers.
translation.es: Estás arriesgando tu vida si vas allíy trabajas para cultivadores ilegales.

translation.en: Any underground industry has its seedy side.
translation.es: Toda industria clandestinatiene su lado turbio.

translation.en: That's why they call it the underground.
translation.es: Por eso es clandestina.

translation.en: You have people coming here with this idealistic view
translation.es: Hay gente que llegacon esa visión idealista... HISTORIADOR

translation.en: that they're going to make some money for the entire year by trimming marijuana in Humboldt County.
translation.es: ...de que ganarán dinero para todo el añocortando marihuana en el Condado Humboldt.

translation.en: Well, they're putting themselves at huge risk.
translation.es: Se están arriesgando enormemente.

translation.en: And you could end up dead in a ravine. And it has happened, and it is happening,
translation.es: Y puedes aparecer muerto en un barranco.Ha pasado, y sigue pasando

translation.en: and that's where we need to focus our law enforcement efforts.
translation.es: y en eso se debe concentrar la policía.

translation.en: We need to figure out how to make this industry more safe
translation.es: Tenemos que descubrir cómo hacerque esta industria sea más segura

translation.en: for the people who are involved in it.
translation.es: para la gente que trabaja en ella.

translation.en: And I think legalization will provide that in the end.
translation.es: Creo que la legalización lo logrará.

translation.en: [man] This area out in Alderpoint, there's zero police,
translation.es: En esta zona de Alderpoint,hay cero policía,

translation.en: there's zero protection.
translation.es: hay cero protección.

translation.en: Everyone's out for themselves.
translation.es: Cada uno se protege a sí mismo.

translation.en: You're putting up fences, you're having loaded weapons...
translation.es: Pones cercas, llevas armas cargadas...

translation.en: um, and you got to feel safe, and that's the only way to do it.
translation.es: RESIDENTE DE HUMBOLDT Es la única forma de sentirte seguro.

translation.en: This is the Emerald Triangle: Trinity, Humboldt, Mendocino.
translation.es: Este es el Triángulo Esmeralda:Trinity, Humboldt, Mendocino.

translation.en: Alderpoint is almost literally in the epicenter.
translation.es: Alderpoint es casi literalmenteel epicentro.

translation.en: [Sheriff] Alderpoint is a very unique area. So this is an area of southern Humboldt County...
translation.es: Alderpoint es una zona muy particulardel sur del Condado Humboldt...

translation.en: uh, that area, we refer to it as Murder Mountain.
translation.es: A esa zona la llamamosla Montaña Asesina.

translation.en: I was working on Murder Mountain
translation.es: Trabajaba en la Montaña Asesina

translation.en: before I ever knew it was called Murder Mountain.
translation.es: antes de saber que se llamaba así.

translation.en: I don't know if you heard that name, Murder Mountain?
translation.es: ¿Conocen la Montaña Asesina?

translation.en: I think the name says it all.
translation.es: El nombre lo dice todo.

translation.en: Right over that mountain, Murder Mountain.
translation.es: Si atraviesas la Montaña Asesina.

translation.en: Go down Bell Springs a ways,
translation.es: Y bajas a Bell Springs,

translation.en: start seeing cars piled up on top of each other three and four high.
translation.es: comienzas a ver autos apiladosde a tres o cuatro.

translation.en: All the serial numbers blasted off 'em with a torch.
translation.es: Los número de seriefueron quemados con un soplete.

translation.en: Who knows where the fucking bodies are at?
translation.es: ¿Quién sabe dónde están los cuerpos?

translation.en: [Lonny] Murder Mountain is not a mystery.
translation.es: La Montaña Asesina no es un misterio.Subes allá

translation.en: You go up there to work in a secluded area and do a risky trade
translation.es: La Montaña Asesina no es un misterio.Subes allá a trabajar en una zona recluiday a hacer un negocio peligroso

translation.en: with risky, shady people,
translation.es: con gente peligrosa

translation.en: and a lot of that property's changed hands so many times
translation.es: y esas propiedadescambian de manos muchas veces

translation.en: because none of the locals want to buy it.
translation.es: porque los lugareños no las compran.

translation.en: So if you have money and you want to invest in this area, and you want to grow on it, you look for whatever's available.
translation.es: Si tienes dinero y quieres invertir aquí,y cultivar, buscas lo que esté disponible.

translation.en: A lot of people will go there and buy it,
translation.es: Y mucha gente va y compra,

translation.en: 'cause it's either affordable or it's the only thing on the market.
translation.es: porque es baratoo es lo único en el mercado.

translation.en: You want an outlaw community, that's the Alderpoint area.
translation.es: En Alderpointhay una comunidad clandestina.

translation.en: I helped the sheriff's department with a shooting they had up there,
translation.es: Ayudé a la comisaría con la investigación

translation.en: the investigation a few years ago.
translation.es: de un tiroteo que hubo allíhace unos años.

translation.en: And I had not been up there in that vicinity since the '80s.
translation.es: Y no había estadoen los alrededores desde los 80.

translation.en: And just saw what it had become.
translation.es: Y vi en qué se había convertido.

translation.en: And I went up in a caravan of sheriff's deputies for this investigation,
translation.es: Iba en una caravana de agentespara la investigación,

translation.en: and in front of our column to the rear of our column I see guys jump out
translation.es: y frente a nuestra columnay detrás de ella veía tipos saltando

translation.en: in Enduro motorcycles with shotguns strapped to their backs.
translation.es: con motos de enduroy con escopetas en la espalda.

translation.en: And I start to reach for my sidearm, and the deputy I was with assured me,
translation.es: Iba a agarrar mi armay el agente que estaba conmigo me dijo:

translation.en: "Don't worry about it. That's what they do.
translation.es: "No te preocupes. Esto es lo que hacen.

translation.en: They're just escorting us through the area." And I thought, "Are you kidding me?
translation.es: Solo nos escoltan por esta zona".Y pensé: "¿Es broma?

translation.en: We're the police. What do you mean, they're escorting us?"
translation.es: Somos la policía.¿Cómo que nos escoltan?".

translation.en: They were working security for the marijuana farms there.
translation.es: Eran los de seguridadde las plantaciones de marihuana de aquí.

translation.en: It was something else to see that that existed here,
translation.es: Fue increíble ver que eso existía aquí,

translation.en: in America, in Humboldt County.
translation.es: en los Estados Unidos, en Humboldt.

translation.en: It's their own law up there. It's their own country,
translation.es: Tienen sus propias leyes allí.Es su propio país,

translation.en: and they just kinda rule things how they rule 'em, run 'em how they run 'em.
translation.es: y tienen sus propias reglas,lo manejan como quieren.

translation.en: It's like a surreal Mad Max scenario.
translation.es: Es como una escena surrealista de Mad Max.

translation.en: If you don't have protection from the law, you have to be the law.
translation.es: Si no te protege la ley, debes ser la ley.

translation.en: They have their own forms of justice,
translation.es: Tienen su propia clase de justicia,

translation.en: because they live in the backwoods for a reason.
translation.es: porque viven en una zona aisladapor un motivo.

translation.en: It looks like pretty much everything's just been destroyed.
translation.es: Parece que destruyeron casi todo.

translation.en: This was my house.
translation.es: Esta era mi casa.

translation.en: My cabin.
translation.es: Mi cabaña.

translation.en: Looks like what they didn't steal, they just broke.
translation.es: Parece que lo que no robaron,lo rompieron.

translation.en: Couple of guys we hired about two months ago.
translation.es: Unos tipos que contratamos hace dos meses.

translation.en: I fired 'em, but I didn't think that was a big enough reason they'd totally fuck my life up.
translation.es: Los despedí, pero no creíque fueran a destruir mi vida.

translation.en: Yeah, shit's all gone. Cloning room, lights, fans. Everything.
translation.es: No hay nada. El cuarto de clonación,las luces, los ventiladores. Todo.

translation.en: I don't think we'll be back up and running for probably at least a month.
translation.es: No creo que volvamos a funcionarpor lo menos por un mes.

translation.en: Maybe two months, which could cost... just about everything.
translation.es: Tal vez dos meses, lo que podría...costarnos todo.

translation.en: The peace and love thing kinda went out with the '70s,
translation.es: Eso de la paz y el amor quedó en los 70,

translation.en: and anymore it's...
translation.es: y ahora...

translation.en: it's all about the power of the dollar, and pretty much everybody for themselves.
translation.es: ...todo tiene que ver con el poderdel dólar y cada uno se cuida a sí mismo.

translation.en: If somebody does you wrong, you need to get 'em back.
translation.es: Si alguien te hace algo malo,debes vengarte.

translation.en: It's the last vestige of the Wild West.
translation.es: Es el último vestigio del Lejano Oeste.

translation.en: -Clear. -Yeah.
translation.es: - Despejado.- Sí.

translation.en: [woman] We begged Garret not to go to Humboldt.
translation.es: Le rogamos a Garretque no fuera a Humboldt.

translation.en: But there was no talking him out of it.
translation.es: Pero no había forma de disuadirlo.

translation.en: He had heard about a potential job to make a lot of money...
translation.es: Escuchó de un posible trabajocon el que ganaría mucho dinero... TÍA DE GARRET

translation.en: in what was called Murder Mountain.
translation.es: ...en lo que llamaban la Montaña Asesina.

translation.en: [Buzz] I'd first heard the name Murder Mountain
translation.es: La primera vez que escuché ese nombre

translation.en: from someone that Garret had communicated with on a regular basis.
translation.es: fue de boca de alguiencon quien Garret se comunicaba seguido.

translation.en: And she said that she had already been up there to see him. She had gone to visit him,
translation.es: Y ella dijo que había ido a verlo,que lo había visitado,

translation.en: and she said that Garret was in with a really bad crowd,
translation.es: y dijo que Garret estabaen un ambiente muy malo

translation.en: and they weren't anything like Garret was used to.
translation.es: y que no tenía nada que vercon lo que Garret conocía.

translation.en: She just was warning me.
translation.es: Ella me lo advirtió.

translation.en: She was telling me that Garret's in danger.
translation.es: Me dijo que Garret estaba en peligro.

translation.en: You know, he has to get out of there as quickly as possible.
translation.es: Que debía salir de allílo más rápido posible.

translation.en: [Bonnie] Last time I saw Garret,
translation.es: La última vez que lo vi,

translation.en: he had phoned me and said that they needed an SUV,
translation.es: me había llamado y me dijoque necesitaban un todoterreno,

translation.en: a four-wheel drive up there.
translation.es: una cuatro por cuatro allí.

translation.en: So we went car lot to car lot.
translation.es: Recorrimos concesionarias.

translation.en: We finally found one, and the one that he wanted...
translation.es: Por fin encontramos la que quería...

translation.en: -[camera shutter clicks] -I think it was a Dodge Ram.
translation.es: Creo que era una Dodge Ram.

translation.en: He got in the truck.
translation.es: Subió a la camioneta.

translation.en: And I left him there at the parking lot.
translation.es: Y lo dejé allí en el estacionamiento.

translation.en: [Eileen over radio] Another man is believed to be missing somewhere in the hills of Humboldt County.
translation.es: Se cree que otro hombre desaparecióen los cerros del Condado Humboldt.

translation.en: Today, the sheriff's office issued a press release asking for the public's assistance
translation.es: Hoy, la policía publicóun comunicado de prensa pidiendo ayuda

translation.en: in finding 29-year-old Garret Rodriguez.
translation.es: para encontrara Garret Rodriguez, de 29 años.

translation.en: He is reportedly driving a 1998 Dodge Ram pickup truck.
translation.es: Se cree que conduceuna camioneta Dodge Ram 1998.

translation.en: Anyone with information is asked to contact the Humboldt County Sheriff's Office.
translation.es: Si tiene información, comuníquesecon la comisaría del Condado Humboldt.

translation.en: [female investigator] So, you're at your residence.
translation.es: Entonces, está en su residencia.¿Qué nota?

translation.en: What do you notice? You said something about...
translation.es: Dijo algo sobre...

translation.en: [male informant] A bunch of cars, trucks, motorcycles, and off-road vehicles pass my place.
translation.es: Varios autos, camionetas, motosy todoterrenos pasan por mi casa.

translation.en: I stay by myself. I'm an isolationist.
translation.es: Vivo solo. Soy un aislacionista.

translation.en: Since Vietnam.
translation.es: Desde Vietnam.

translation.en: I moved to the Redwoods to get away from civilization.
translation.es: Me mudé al bosque de secoyaspara alejarme de la civilización.

translation.en: And I'm in no way involved with the crime.
translation.es: Y no estoy involucrado con el delito.

translation.en: [investigator] I'll reiterate.
translation.es: Reitero.

translation.en: If you've done nothing wrong there's nothing to worry about.
translation.es: Si no hizo nada malo,no tiene de qué preocuparse.

translation.en: [informant] Okay.
translation.es: Bueno.
